scripts.dev:ios:sim: rm -f src-tauri/gen/apple/Externals/arm64/*/libapp.a && cd src-tauri && cargo tauri ios dev --open
scripts.build:ios: npm run build && cd src-tauri && cargo tauri build --target aarch64-apple-ios-sim --debug && cp target/aarch64-apple-ios-sim/debug/deps/libpeek_save_lib.a gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Debug/libapp.a
scripts.build:ios:sim:release: npm run build && cd src-tauri && cargo tauri build --target aarch64-apple-ios-sim && cp target/aarch64-apple-ios-sim/release/deps/libpeek_save_lib.a gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Release/libapp.a
scripts.build:ios:release: npm run build && cd src-tauri && cargo tauri build --target aarch64-apple-ios && cp target/aarch64-apple-ios/release/deps/libpeek_save_lib.a gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Release/libapp.a
scripts.dev:ios:quick: mkdir -p src-tauri/gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Debug && cp src-tauri/target/aarch64-apple-ios-sim/debug/deps/libpeek_save_lib.a src-tauri/gen/apple/Externals/arm64/Debug/libapp.a && open src-tauri/gen/apple/peek-save.xcodeproj && npx vite --port 1420
scripts.clean:rust: cd src-tauri && rm -rf target/aarch64-apple-ios-sim/debug/build/peek-save-* target/aarch64-apple-ios/release/build/peek-save-* 2>/dev/null; touch build.rs; echo 'Rust bridge cache cleaned'
scripts.clean:ios: cd src-tauri && rm -rf target/aarch64-apple-ios-sim/debug/build/peek-save-* 2>/dev/null; touch build.rs; echo 'iOS simulator cache cleaned'
scripts.clean:ios:release: cd src-tauri && rm -rf target/aarch64-apple-ios/release/build/peek-save-* 2>/dev/null; touch build.rs; echo 'iOS release cache cleaned'
scripts.rebuild:ios: npm run clean:ios && npm run build:ios
scripts.rebuild:ios:release: npm run clean:ios:release && npm run build:ios:release
